Package model

Class Basket

java.lang.Object
model.Basket
public class Basket extends Object
Represents a shopping basket which the user can add Booking objects to
Author:
Conan

    • setBookingPrices

      public void setBookingPrices(ArrayList<Play> plays)
      Iterates through the basket, gets the playId for each booking, and fetches the play with that Id from the database. Gets the price from said play and applies it to the relevant booking
      Parameters:
